Name: Gypsy #1
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Green Chartreuse (or alternative herbal liqueur)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lime zest twist.
Express lime zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Dominic Venegas, this cocktail's creator, describes it as "a little homage to the Last Word cocktail".
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2007 by Dominic Venegas at Bourbon & Branch in San Francisco, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Gypsy #1 contains 182 calories
